name: Harpy Eagle
headline: Their talons can be as long as a grizzly bear's claws.

name: Macaw
headline: They are known for their ability to mimic human speech and sounds.

name: Howler Monkey
headline: They are one of the largest and heaviest among New World monkeys.

name: Sloth
headline: They are skilled swimmers and can move surprisingly quickly in water.

name: Tapir
headline: The Amazonian tapir is the largest of all tapir species.

name: Toucan
headline: Toucans have a distinctive waddle while walking.
